name: @solutioniser/next-starter-templates
description: Template files for the @solutioniser/create-next-starter CLI tool

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push origin main --tags
scripts.version:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && git push origin main --tags
scripts.version:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.version:rc: npm version prerelease --preid=rc && git push origin main --tags

author: Solutioniser
